item.title: 花旗集团任命 Nicole Giles 为首席会计官
item.description: 花旗集团周二表示，Nicole Giles 将从 2 月 21 日起担任该公司的首席会计官。【原文：Citigroup said on Tuesday Nicole Giles will be its chief accounting officer, effective as of February 21.】

item.title: 西方石油公司报告第四季度亏损
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）周二公布了第四季度亏损报告，石油和天然气公司受到了价格下跌的影响。【原文：Occidental Petroleum reported a fourth-quarter loss on Tuesday, as the oil and gas firm was hurt by lower prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行第一季度现金收益因减值费用增加而下滑
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行周三公布，受信贷减值费用和所得税费用增加的影响，其第一季度现金收益下降了 3%，抵消了基本利润的增长。【原文：National Australia Bank reported a 3% drop in its cash earnings for the first quarter on Wednesday, impacted by higher credit impairment charges and income tax expense, which offset growth in underlying profit.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国石油公司（BP）考虑出售价值 100 亿美元的嘉实多润滑油部门
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，石油巨头英国石油公司（BP）正在考虑出售其润滑油业务嘉实多（Castrol），交易价值约为 100 亿美元。【原文：Oil major BP is considering a potential sale of its lubricants business, Castrol, which could be worth about $10 billion in a deal, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Bumble 预测第一季度收入低于预期，股价下跌
item.description: 周二，Bumble 预测其第一季度营收低于分析师预期，这表明这家约会应用运营商促进增长的努力比预期花费的时间更长，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌了 11%。【原文：Bumble forecast its first-quarter revenue below analysts' estimate on Tuesday, signaling that the dating app operator's efforts to boost growth is taking longer than expected, sending its shares down 11% in extended trading.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，银湖公司接近达成收购英特尔 Altera 部门多数股权的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引知情人士的话报道称，收购公司银湖（Silver Lake）正在就收购英特尔可编程芯片业务 Altera 的多数股权进行独家谈判。【原文：Buyout firm Silver Lake is in exclusive talks to purchase a majority stake in Intel's programmable chip business Altera, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Pershing Square 提议以每股 90 美元的价格购买霍华德-休斯公司的 1000 万股股票
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）周二表示，将以每股 90 美元的价格购买霍华德-休斯控股公司（Howard Hughes Holdings）新发行的 1,000 万股股票，这是该公司对这家房地产开发商提出的修订方案。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's Pershing Square Capital Management said on Tuesday it would buy 10 million newly issued shares of Howard Hughes Holdings for $90 apiece in its revised proposal for the real estate developer.】

item.title: 12 月份外国持有的美国国债减少
item.description: 美国财政部周二公布的数据显示，由于美国国债最大的两个外国持有者--日本和中国--都削减了国债投资组合，12月份外国持有的美国国债数量有所下降。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries fell in December as the two largest foreign holders of the government debt, Japan and China, both cut their portfolios, data from the Treasury Department showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 先锋 ETF 有望超越道富基金成为全球最大基金
item.description: 根据FactSet、LSEG和其他来源的数据，先锋集团（Vanguard Group）的标准普尔500指数ETF正处于最终从竞争对手道富环球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）的产品SPDR S&P 500信托基金手中夺取全球最大交易所交易基金头衔的边缘。【原文：Vanguard Group's Standard & Poor's 500 ETF is on the edge of finally seizing the title of the world's largest exchange-traded fund from rival State Street Global Advisors' product, the SPDR S&P 500 Trust , according to data from FactSet, LSEG and other sources.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会寻求印度帮助调查阿达尼公司欺诈案
item.description: 周二的一份法庭文件显示，美国证券交易委员会已请求印度当局协助调查阿达尼集团创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）及其侄子萨加尔-阿达尼（Sagar Adani）涉嫌证券欺诈和 2.65 亿美元的贿赂计划。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has requested assistance from Indian authorities in its investigation of Adani Group founder Gautam Adani and his nephew Sagar Adani over alleged securities fraud and a $265 million bribery scheme, a court filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德在 ESG 新规出台后暂停公司会议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德暂时中止了与一些投资组合公司的会面，同时研究美国证券交易委员会新的报告规则的影响。【原文：BlackRock has temporarily paused meetings with some portfolio companies while studying the impact of new reporting rules from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 上周美国原油和汽油库存可能增加，馏分油库存减少：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周二的一项初步民意调查显示，预计上周美国原油和汽油库存将有所增加，而馏分油库存则可能下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil and gasoline stockpiles were expected to have risen last week, while distillate inventories likely fell, a preliminary Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普领导的美国证券交易委员会将权力从投资者转移到董事会
item.description: 专家表示，美国最高证券监管机构的新政策赋予了公司董事会更多凌驾于投资者之上的权力，这可能会削弱投资者在从气候政策到董事竞选等各个方面发起的改革努力。【原文：New policies from the top U.S. securities regulator hand corporate boards more power over investors in ways that could curtail investor-initiated reform efforts on everything from climate policy to director contests, experts say.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利希望减少美国关税引发的债券市场波动
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）周二表示，他希望看到中长期债券收益率的波动性减小，因为对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的猜测已经推动了中长期债券收益率的上涨。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said on Tuesday he wanted to see less volatility in medium and longer-dated bond yields that have been driven up by speculation about the trade policies of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: OpenAI 前技术主管米拉-穆拉提的人工智能初创公司从竞争对手中挖来顶尖研究人员
item.description: 由前 OpenAI 首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）创建的人工智能初创公司 Thinking Machines Lab 周二在一篇博文中表示，该公司已经从 OpenAI、Meta 和 Mistral 等竞争对手那里挖来了约 30 名顶尖的研究人员和工程师。【原文：Thinking Machines Lab, an AI startup founded by former OpenAI chief technology officer Mira Murati, has tapped about 30 leading researchers and engineers from competitors such as OpenAI, Meta and Mistral, it said in a blog post on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普裁减联邦工作人员，税务执法人员、火箭科学家和银行监管人员被解雇
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府周二将矛头指向银行监管者、火箭科学家和税务执法人员，试图再解雇数千名联邦雇员，这是对美国公务员制度史无前例的攻击。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration targeted bank regulators, rocket scientists and tax enforcers on Tuesday as it sought to fire thousands more federal employees in an unprecedented assault on the U.S. civil service.】

item.title: 丰田将向密歇根工厂转让 LG Energy 电池订单
item.description: 丰田汽车周二证实，该公司已同意将其 LG Energy Solution 汽车电池订单转移到通用汽车即将退出的密歇根工厂。【原文：Toyota Motor has agreed to transfer its order for LG Energy Solution vehicle batteries to a Michigan plant that General Motors is exiting, the Japanese automaker confirmed Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，特朗普关税助长囤货，美国消费者抢购一空
item.description: 周二，CreditCards.com 的一份报告显示，五分之一的美国人表示，他们购买的商品比平时多，主要原因是担心唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税，这反映出消费者对潜在涨价和经济不确定性的焦虑加剧。【原文：One in five Americans have said they are purchasing more items than usual primarily due to concerns over President Donald Trump's tariffs, a CreditCards.com report showed on Tuesday, reflecting heightened consumer anxiety over potential price hikes and economic uncertainty.】

item.title: Venture Global 液化天然气公司表示，路易斯安那州卡尔卡修帕斯工厂将于四月开始商业运营
item.description: Venture Global 液化天然气公司周一表示，将于 4 月 15 日开始在路易斯安那州 Calcasieu Pass 工厂投入商业运营。【原文：Venture Global LNG will begin commercial operations at its Calcasieu Pass plant in Louisiana on April 15, the company said on Monday, some three years after it shipped its first LNG cargo in a move that led to a protracted dispute with customers.】

item.title: 汇丰将向巴林和科威特银行出售巴林零售银行业务部门
item.description: 汇丰银行周二表示，在该行进行更广泛重组的同时，已同意出售其在巴林的零售银行业务。【原文：HSBC said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell its retail banking operations in Bahrain amid a wider restructuring at the bank.】

item.title: 独家报道福特削减经理股票奖金以降低成本、提高绩效
item.description: 据六位熟知内情的人士透露，福特汽车公司大约一半的中层管理人员今年将得不到股票奖金，这在内部被视为首席执行官吉姆-法利（Jim Farley）削减该汽车公司臃肿成本的最新尝试。【原文：About half the middle managers at Ford Motor will not get stock bonuses this year in what is seen internally as CEO Jim Farley's latest attempt to cut the automaker's bloated costs, according to six people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 券商开始给予 Venture Global 看涨评级后，该公司股价攀升
item.description: Venture Global 尽管 Venture Global 在 1 月份首次上市时表现平平，但多家券商仍对该公司作出了看涨评级，周二该公司股价创下一周新高。【原文：Venture Global shares hit a one-week peak on Tuesday, after several brokerages initiated coverage with bullish ratings on the company despite its drab market debut in January.】

item.title: 独家报道默克公司称，与美国卫生与公众服务部部长肯尼迪有关的疫苗事件被推迟
item.description: 默克公司表示，默克公司和一名起诉该公司的妇女同意停止对该公司生产的人类乳头瘤病毒疫苗涉嫌造成伤害一案的审理，该案与美国卫生与公众服务部部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：Merck and a woman suing the drugmaker agreed to halt a trial over alleged injuries from the drugmaker's human papillomavirus vaccine in a case with ties to U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr, the company said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行延长在家办公政策，其他央行却反其道而行之
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周二表示，该行将其在家办公政策延长了两年，只要求员工有大约50%的时间在办公室，而一些知名企业也正在改变其远程办公政策。【原文：The European Central Bank extended its work-from-home policy by two years on Tuesday, only requiring staff to be in the office for about 50% of their time, the bank said, just as some notable entities are reversing their remote work policies.】

item.title: 美联储戴利：在通胀取得更大进展之前，政策必须保持限制性
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周二表示，虽然没有理由对通胀率向2%迈进的过程崎岖不平、有时甚至难以察觉感到气馁，但美国央行应保持短期借贷成本不变，直到通胀率的进展更加明显。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly on Tuesday said that while there's no reason to be discouraged about the bumpy and sometimes imperceptible progress toward 2% inflation, the U.S. central bank should keep short-term borrowing costs where they are until the progress is more visible.】

item.title: 耐克将与金-卡戴珊的 Skims 合作推出新的女性健身品牌
item.description: 耐克将与金-卡戴珊（Kim Kardashian）旗下的塑身衣公司 Skims 合作，于今年春季在美国推出一个新的女式运动装品牌，耐克首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）正努力加强其产品组合，以更好地与新晋品牌竞争。【原文：Nike will launch a new women's activewear brand in the U.S. this spring in partnership with Kim Kardashian-owned shapewear clothing company Skims, as CEO Elliott Hill works to bolster its portfolio to better compete with upstart brands.】

item.title: 报告显示，投资者在一月份疯狂买入新兴市场
item.description: 国际金融研究所（Institute of International Finance）周二发布的一份受到密切关注的报告显示，1月份投资者向新兴市场国家的债务投入了450亿美元，并买入了20亿美元的中国股票。【原文：Investors piled into emerging market countries' debt to the tune of $45 billion and bought up $2 billion of Chinese stocks in January, a closely followed report from the Institute of International Finance showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，卡夫亨氏有意出售旗下婴儿食品品牌 Plasmon
item.description: 本周二，两位接近此事的消息人士称，全球包装食品集团卡夫亨氏正在与投资银行华利安合作，出售其位于意大利的婴儿食品品牌 Plasmon。【原文：Global packaged food group Kraft Heinz is working with investment bank Houlihan Lokey to sell its Italy-based infant food product brand Plasmon, two sources close to the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国 2 月住宅建筑商信心降至五个月低点
item.description: 由于担心进口关税将与更高的抵押贷款利率相结合，进一步推高住房成本，2 月份美国住宅建筑商的情绪跌至五个月来的最低点。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment tumbled to a five-month low in February amid worries that tariffs on imports would combine with higher mortgage rates to further drive up housing costs.】

item.title: 意大利法院解除对阿玛尼公司劳工行为的管制
item.description: 意大利一家法院周二表示，已提前结束对阿玛尼时装集团旗下一个单位因其中国分包商的劳工行为而实施的特别管理，因为该公司已采取了所有必要的纠正措施。【原文：An Italian court has ended early special administration imposed on a unit of the Armani fashion group over labour practices of its Chinese-owned subcontractors, it said on Tuesday, because the company had taken all the necessary corrective action.】
